# klevu-product-query

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Klevu Product Query popup application that shows a popup for asking questions about a product

| Property                   | Attribute                     | Description                                                                         | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Default                                                     |
